snippet: The farmhouse in Columbia County was a new kind of habitat for a pair that had spent a quarter-century on beaches of Fire Island.
abstract: Sam Grubman and Paul Morris spent five years furnishing their 19th-century farmhouse in Hillsdale, NY, after moving from Fire Island; couple decorated with hanging art they had in storage and built a dock on property's pond.
lead_paragraph: The farmhouse in Columbia County was a new kind of habitat for a pair that had spent a quarter-century on beaches of Fire Island.

headline.seo: Trading a Beach House on Fire Island for a Farmhouse in Columbia County
